mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_tea_house_user( tea_house_num, player_id, nick_name, status, create_time, update_time ) values( #{teaHouseNum}, #{playerId}, #{nickName}, #{status}, now(), now() )

select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_tea_house( tea_house_type_id, tea_house_num, player_id, nick_name, tea_house_owner_word, create_time, update_time ) values( #{teaHouseTypeId}, #{teaHouseNum}, #{playerId}, #{nickName}, #{teaHouseOwnerWord}, now(), now() )

select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_tea_house_type( game_type, total_game, room_banker_type, multiple_limit, pay_type, buttom_score_type, create_time, update_time ) values( #{gameType}, #{totalGame}, #{roomBankerType}, #{multipleLimit}, #{payType}, #{buttomScoreType}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select player_id,nick_name,create_time,is_dian_xiaoer from t_tea_house_user where tea_house_num = #{teaHouseNum} and status=1 limit 100

select a.tea_house_id,a.tea_house_name,a.tea_house_num,a.create_time,a.player_id,a.nick_name, b.game_type,b.total_game,b.room_banker_type,b.multiple_limit,b.pay_type,b.buttom_score_type from t_tea_house a left join t_tea_house_type b on a.tea_house_type_id = b.tea_house_type_id where a.player_id = #{playerId} and a.tea_house_type_id=#{teaHouseTypeId} limit 25

select a.tea_house_num,b.player_id,b.nick_name,a.status,c.game_type,c.total_game,c.room_banker_type,c.multiple_limit,c.pay_type,c.buttom_score_type from t_tea_house_user a left join t_tea_house b on a.tea_house_num = b.tea_house_num left join t_tea_house_type c on b.tea_house_type_id = c.tea_house_type_id where a.player_id = #{playerId} and a.status = 1 limit 25

select b.player_id,b.nick_name,b.head_img_url,b.status from t_tea_house a left join t_tea_house_user b on a.tea_house_num = b.tea_house_num where a.tea_house_num = #{teaHouseNum} and b.status = 0 limit 25
select b.*,a.tea_house_owner_word,a.tea_house_num,a.player_id from t_tea_house a left join t_tea_house_type b on a.tea_house_type_id = b.tea_house_type_id where a.tea_house_num = #{teaHouseNum}
